text.tspan: The Quasars are the only group outside the
Empire with the blueprint and knowledge
necessary to create the powerful Titan weapon.
This makes them the only group with a chance
of defeating the Empire in a long-term conflict.
Despite their impressive fighting ability, the
Quasars must be more vital to stand up to
the Empire on their own, especially since the
Empire has access to the mighty Titan
However, the Quasars can win against other
battles if the Empire does not have the Titan
can be considered a resistance group.
He led his army and newly recruited
to establish a base for the Quasars.
Many people who oppose the Empire's
expansion or have been harmed by the
Empire have joined the Quasars since
its establishment. The group is made
up of rebels who are committed to
Turner Cobain, an old Fidelian Empire general,
became the resistance leader called Quasars.
The Quasars is an independent organization
that rebels against the Fidelian Empire.
Gary uses connections inside and outside the
Empire to team up with other assassin groups
for joint operations when a large-scale force is
The lounge staff at Gary's establishment are
also professional killers with extensive combat
expertise, but they are better suited for covert
Misa defends Gary at all times and is
passed down in her family for centuries.
he is fortunate to have Misa, a
Despite Gary's position as the leader, the members of Gary's
Lounge are encouraged to speak their minds and express
their opinions without fear of repercussions as they advance
Gary has extensive connections with empire-
wide traders, who provide him access to a
advanced insights from sources such as
This valuable information is sold at a high
price, contributing to the financial success of
Gary has assembled a team of around ten
professional hitmen that he knows and trusts.
He is selective in his hiring process and only
brings on recruits who can handle the
Once a member joins, they are not allowed to
Even when someone knows Gary’s Lounge, they
frequently only have a limited understanding of
it, and very few see the assassination plot.
While it is a typical pub,
possessing enough fighting skill to intimidate
even veteran soldiers. It is estimated that
only a few thousand could stand against half

providing standard weapons to all members,
there is no significant difference in combat

made the Kossacks the strongest army

they do not issue orders that go against

the battalions must adhere to this
Kin is the leader of the Kossacks and is
leader known as a battalion officer.
When the Kossacks receive a job from
the Fidelian Empire, Kin assigns tasks
to the appropriate battalions based on
their skills and abilities. The battalion
officers then assess the specific needs of
They tend to be mechanical and ruthless in
achieving their goals and work exclusively
for the Fidelian Empire. Despite their
reputation, they are sometimes seen as
Despite this, they are widely respected for
tend to avoid social controversy. Therefore,
